title: Retro Tech: Robots
description: Im taking a look at the tech predictions of the past that we thought would be our future  and in particular robots. I cast an eye back to the toy robots of the 60s, 70s, and 80s and some of the movies that spawned them. And along the way I talk to UrAvgConsumer and Chris Gethard.   0:00 Intro 0:50 Unboxing Omnibot 2:52 Talking About Robots 6:08 Dope Or Nope 9:53 Androbot 11:56 Building A Robot 15:48 Envisioning The Future 18:12 Designing The Perfect Robot
